add_language.tooltip: Add a new language to the dictionaries folder.

clear_edit_box.tooltip: Clear the content of the edit box.

delete_language.tooltip: Delete the selected language from the dictionaries folder.

load_dic_file.tooltip: Load the content of the selected dictionary file into the edit box.

load_template.tooltip: Load the dictionary template into the edit box.

save_dic_file.tooltip: Save the content of the edit box to the selected dictionary file.

new_language.tooltip: Enter the name of the new language to add to the dictionaries folder.

The filename contains some characters that aren't allowed.

Invalid characters:

Invalid characters:

SaveToDicFile.message: Are you sure you want to save the content of the edit box to the selected dictionary file?
SaveToDicFile.title: Save to Dictionary File

reset_save_window_size.tooltip: Reset the save window size to its default value.

reset_everything.tooltip: Reset all settings to their default values.

reset_ui_appearance_settings.tooltip: Reset UI appearance related settings to their default values.

reset_window_position.tooltip: Reset the window position to its default value.

reset_window_settings.tooltip: Reset window related settings to their default values.

reset_window_size.tooltip: Reset the window size to its default value.

center_window_on_startup.tooltip: Center the window on the screen on application startup.

save_window_position.tooltip: Save the window position on application exit to restore it on the next launch.

save_window_size.tooltip: Save the window size on application exit to restore it on the next launch.

use_high_dpi_scaling.tooltip: Use high DPI scaling for better appearance on high resolution displays.

whole_word_replacement.tooltip: Replace whole words only, not substrings.

ui_color_theme.tooltip: Select a UI Color Theme for the application.

ui_language.tooltip: Select a UI Language for the application.

ui_theme.tooltip: Select a UI Theme for the application.

open_output_dir.tooltip: Open the output directory in Explorer

StartTranslation.title: Start Translation
